detail_desc: Imitation leather sandals with adjustable straps with a hook and loop fastening, and a loop at the back. Moulded imitation leather insoles and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.

Blouse in woven fabric with buttons down the front and a grandad collar with narrow ties. Double-layered yoke with a seam and pleat at the back, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Short Bohemian top in a jacquard-weave Orange Fiber™ and Tencel™ lyocell blend with a pattern in glittery threads. Sweetheart neckline at the top with a silicone trim and integral support panels and grosgrain trims that fasten on the inside for extra support, and a zip at the back. Pleats front and back and 3/4-length balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the top and cuffs. Organic cotton lining. Orange Fiber™ is made from citrus peel that is a by-product of juice production transformed into a sustainable, high-quality fabric that reduces waste and saves natural resources.
Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and buttons, slim legs and hard-worn details.
Cigarette trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a fake fly, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and slim, gently tapered legs with creases. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.
5-pocket, low-rise shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shorts in soft jersey with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and frills down the sides.

Short, wide dress in an airy weave with a V-shaped opening at the top and narrow ties at the neckline. 3/4-length raglan puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs and a seam at the waist and on the skirt. Unlined.
Cardigan in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, press-studs down the front, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a stand-up collar with a zip at the front and a kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Cropped vest top in stretch, ribbed cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with a racer back.

Long-sleeved shirt in washed Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for light lift and a fuller cleavage. Adjustable, lace-trimmed shoulder straps that cross at the back and a hook-and-eye fastening.
Cardigan knitted in a soft mohair blend with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, front pockets and no buttons.
Shirt dress in soft, checked cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with a tab and button, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Sleeveless sports top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and an opening and ties at the back of the hem.

Soft, non-wired lace bra with moulded, lightly padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated trim at the hem and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Pyjama bottoms in jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Polo-neck jumper in crêpe jersey with a concealed zip at the back of the neck, lightly padded shoulders and long sleeves.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Short dungaree dress in stretch cotton corduroy with a pocket at the top, adjustable straps with metal fasteners at the front, and buttons at the sides.

Soft, non-wired bra in ribbed jersey with wide elastic at the hem. Adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Solid colour ties in a grosgrain weave. Width 6.5 cm.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a knot detail on the top.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Suit trousers in a linen weave with an extended waistband and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Long metal earrings with plastic beads covered in matt fabric. Length 10.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Jumper knitted in soft velour yarn in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hat in a soft, textured knit with a small imitation leather appliqué at the front and a ribbed hem.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a collar, chest pocket, buttons down the front and a tie-front hem.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke on the shoulders and at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Suit trousers in a stretch wool weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets, and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Slightly longer, straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in a soft weave with notch lapels, fastening with one sparkly button at the front, and two flap front pockets. Lined.
Trousers in printed sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Lightly padded all-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with press-studs down the front that continue down one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Polyester padding.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Small pouch bag in snakeskin-patterned imitation leather with a zip and small metal appliqué at the top. Lined. Size.3x8x10 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a round neck and long sleeves. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Long-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with a round neck and gathered side seams for optimum comfort over the tummy.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft jersey made from pima cotton containing some silk in a relaxed style with short slits in the sides.
Bracelet in soft faux fur with a snap-on strap and soft toy head with embroidered details at one end. Size 3.5x17 cm.
Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave with a deep V-neck front and back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Buttons down the front and ties at the hem.
Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with glittery details, a hook and loop fastening at the front, a padded edge and tongue, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
Short, three-strand necklace made of metal and glass beads. One of the chains has a pendant. Adjustable length 40-47.5 cm.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and skinny legs. Skinny fit.
Boxy jumper in a fine knit with a soft brushed finish. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Shirt in softly draping silk with a collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Long puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Straight-style joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, front and back pockets, a fake fly and legs with decorative seams at the knees and narrow hems.
Round sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
5-pocket skirt in washed denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button, and a frayed, raw-edge hem.
Boots in imitation suede with an ankle-height shaft, padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Pile linings, jersey insoles and chunky, patterned soles.
Scarf in a patterned cotton weave. Size 45x45 cm.
Captain’s cap in woven fabric. Lined.
Short skirt in a textured knit with contrasting colour trims. High waist with covered elastication and decorative front pockets with a button. Unlined.
Set of two pairs of socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. One pair in an adult size (7.5-11.5) and one pair in a child size.
Long-sleeved bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a button at the neckline.
Set in soft organic cotton jersey. Short-sleeved, patterned bodysuit with press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and side pockets. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Fitted jersey top in a cotton blend with gathers front and back and long sleeves.

Set with a T-shirt and joggers in soft cotton. T-shirt in soft, printed jersey. Joggers in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved Henley top in organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and a woven yoke.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Treggings with a high waist and concealed elastication.
Knee-length shorts in printed cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and fake front pockets.
V-neck jumper in a fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in sturdy cotton twill with a high waist, zip fly, side pockets and flap back pockets with a button. Straight, wide legs with creases and wide turn-ups at the hems.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in woven fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a deep V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top. Detachable belt at the waist with a covered buckle, a concealed zip in one side and straight, ankle-length legs.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Hat in soft, rib-knit cotton with an appliqué on the turned-up hem.

Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a soft, denim-look cotton blend. Press-studs on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves with ribbed side panels, a ribbed kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
